text: Kho mwirecheshe khulwa bo shingala munyala nende amani nende tsifarasi tsiaboywa atsirecheshele; murisilie khubio Abasuku ba Nyasaye nende Abasuku benyu, nende Abandi abalali abo, abamulamanyile tawe halali Nyasaye niye ubamanyile. Ne shiosi shiosi shiamurusia imbeli wa Nyasaye mulakalusilibwa, ne shimulikholelwa obubii tawe
